phrases: Do not you want to know...
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Doushite umaku ikanai wa
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kono unmei bakari I love
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Atsui omoi wo uketomete
Doko made mo tsunagattetai
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
I love this destiny
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
Episode 11 ...
On that day two years ago, I was with Onee-chan.
We were both out shopping.
You had not called or texted her, so Onee-chan was feeling down all morning.
Did you two have a fight?
Not really.
You have been obsessed with your cell phone this whole time.
It is so stupid.
He should just apologize already.
Yeah, I know!
And that is when he drove by.
Kagawa.
Onee-chan's ex.
The worst man ever, who had a habit of beating her.
Want a ride?
That is quite all right.
What is up with that?
You are awfully cold.
What happened to your little boyfriend?
What was his name again?
Yano?
He left you alone on a beautiful day like this?
Mind your own business.
Nana.
Happy birthday.
I had also completely forgotten.
July 29th.
It was Onee-chan's birthday.
It makes sense why she was waiting for her cell phone to ring all day, does not it?
Wait a second.
She got into his car over a simple happy birthday?
I guess she would go all the way to his house with a Merry Christmas...
There is really no saving her.
You should have...
But you were too late.
Do you regret it?
You tried calling her...
I am sorry?
Of all the things she left behind, I checked Onee-chan's cell phone.
I guess you did not want to text her.
Important things should be spoken out loud, I suppose.
You must have wanted to apologize, right?
But unfortunately, she did not pick up.
You called at 4:15 PM.
Conveniently, that was when she was out driving with Kagawa.
Onee-chan's accident was at 4:38 PM.
Who knows why Onee-chan did not pick up the phone.
Stop it.
Stop it...
Why are you telling Yano this sort of stuff now?
Why did you decide to finally come tell him something from two years ago now?
Takahashi.
Why are you trying to confuse him with all of this stuff?
What are you trying to get out of this, Yamamoto-san?
Do not worry about it, go back inside.
I have to worry.
I will be fine.
Yeah, do not worry.
There is nothing to worry about.
Not a single thing happened.
So relax and go back inside like a good girl, Takahashi-san.
This all happened in the past.
It has nothing to do with you at all.
Yano...?
What are you trying to do?
Some kind of revenge?
Harassment?
Are you saying it is my fault she was riding in his car?!
You are saying I am cold-hearted for not going to the funeral?!
Is it because I was not with her on her birthday?
In that case, tell me why she did not answer her phone!
She could not pick it up because she was with Kagawa?
She got what she deserved!
Yano?
That is a pretty rude way of speaking about the dead.
Just because she is dead does not mean her sins have gotten lighter.
Even after she started going out with me, she was never through with Kagawa.
I cannot hear anything.
Then, what about your sin?
What about...
Have you forgotten about that day two years ago?
That day, two years ago...
Yano, what are you doing?
If we do not hurry, Mom will come back.
There was a cat.
A cat?
A black cat.
A really small one.
Today's... Friday, right?
Black cats are bad luck when they cross your path.
Hurry up.
What is it?
It is nothing...
Just tell me already.
You have been like this the whole time.
Is not this your first time?
It is.
Did you get cold feet or something?
Do not talk like that.
You... had not forgotten about Onee-chan at all.
You betrayed both me and her...
Or did you just try to use me as a replacement for her?
Everything is going exactly how you want it to, is not it?
Are you satisfied?
Go home.
Let me...
In Onee-chan's incoming call history...
It was not just that day.
It looked like they were talking all summer.
She betrayed you first.
Are not you glad?
Did Yamamoto-san go home?
A-Ah, Yeah.
That is good.
You are leaving?
Hey, wait up!
Takahashi.
That hurt!
You hit me with the corner of your bag!
Why are you so fast to throw things at me?
Hey!
I am bleeding!
Hey, Takahashi!
Wait!
You liar!
Why am I an outsider?!
Why could not you let me hear what she had to say?!
You are hiding something, are not you?!
I am not hiding anything...
You are the one who said there would be no secrets between us!
You tell me not to betray you, but you go and betray me!
Takahashi, betraying someone is not like that.
Should I tell you what it means to betray someone?
It is when you never treat someone special, walk all over him, tear him to pieces, and then abandon him.
Cannot you tell how special you are to me?
Cannot you tell how hard I am trying to keep us together?
When have I ever betrayed you?
When did I ever toss you away?!
Yano...
It hurts...
Just go home by yourself.
When did I ever toss you away?!
Does Yano think Nana-san tossed him away?
It is when you never treat someone special, walk all over him, tear him to pieces...
I never would have thought such words could come from Yano's mouth...
You will never...
What can I do...
Is not loving him enough?
Cannot my love become his strength?
I want him to trust me...
No matter what happened...
Definitely do not do something stupid like tell Takahashi about it.
Just try telling her the truth.
You will regret it for rest of your life.
I will not tell her.
There is no way I can.
Besides...
Besides?
It was just with Yamamoto that time.
That is all.
But you regret it, do not you?
Regret?
I do not regret anything I have done.
Never have, never will.
Why are you hiding it, then?
Because I do not want to see her cry.
She will cry, without a doubt.
That is why I am not going to tell her.
In other words, you regret it.
I do not regret it.
I do not.
I just feel like I... screwed up a little.
It is kind of hard to talk to him...
I have been thinking about it yesterday and today this whole time, and now it is lunch break already.
Nana!
Everyone is going to play dodgeball.
Ah... I have to take care of the class's day book, so go on without me.
Daily helper
Daily helper
Daily helper
Okay.
It is so quiet.
Everything that happened yesterday seems so unreal.
Yano and Yamamoto are pretending it did not happen, too.
It is weird.
Takahashi.
You forgot your English book yesterday, right?
I brought it with me.
Do not you need your text book?
Will not you be in trouble in fifth period without it?
Nana-chan, they are going to call on you today, you know.
I guess you could not do your homework since you did not have your textbook, right?
Man, that must suck!
Completely forgot about it
Completely forgot about it
I thought you might be called on today, so I translated all of the sentences for you last night.
I wrote them all out for you.
I was up until 2 AM.
Thank you...
In the end, I just cannot hate him.
Yano, your drawing...
I am good at it, are not I?
He is awful at it.
Yet... he did all this for me...
Yano.
I love you more than anyone else in the world.
That is why, Yano...
Because I love you, I do not like being deceived.
If you understand what I am trying to say...
Talk to me.
I will be fine.
No matter what happened...
Here is three choices!
One.
I confessed my love to Yamamoto, and was turned down.
Two.
Yamamoto confessed her love to me, and I turned her down.
Three.
Yamamoto and I were in love with each other.
Now, which is true?
N-Number two?
Bzzt.
One?
Bzzt.
Three?
Bzzt!
Ah, that was just a warm up!
What?
For real this time.
One.
I sexually harassed Yamamoto.
I have had enough already.
This is so stupid...
Ah... two.
Yamamoto stalked me.
Geez, just forget it.
What?
We are still in the middle of the questions.
Yano, you are just trying to sneak out of it.
You never intended to discuss this seriously.
I am being serious.
It is too weird, you moron.
Well, you might think number three's the weirdest one.
Oh, enough already.
Three.
Yamamoto and I had sex.
Yeah, nothing but weird ones.
It is weird, is not it?
It is so stupid.
I am surprised you could think up something that weird...
Yeah.
Especially that third one...
Even if you were joking, that is just sick.
Yeah.
It is sick.
No matter what happened...
I will accept it.
You will regret it for the rest of your life.
I do not regret anything I have done.
Never have, never will.
I just feel like I... screwed up a little.
I just feel...
Kisetsu ga sukoshi ugoita ki ga suru
Hizashi mo mijikaku itsuka zurete
Futari no basu wa kawaranai machi
Hashitteiru koto hotto shiteta
Mado no soto itsumo mitai ni miteru anata
Soshite watashi mo mane wo shiteru
Itsumo mitai ni
Nee futari wa onaji na no ka na
Ikitai basho wa namattetatte iin da yo ne
Nee futari wa onaji na no ka na
Itoshiii kimochii anata no shisen wa i am about to mienakute
Nee futari wa onaji na no ka na

Nee futari wa onaji na no ka na

I feel like the season have changed slightly
and the sunbeams have thinned and will one day shift.
But I was relieved, knowing our bus
was riding through our unchanged city.
You always gaze up at me from outside my window
and I mimic you by doing the same
like always.
Hey, I wonder if we are both the same?
Even if the place we want to go to has gotten dull, it is all right.
Hey, I wonder if we are both the same?
I still feel love for you, but you are no longer looking at me.
Hey, I wonder if we are both the same?
Even if the place we want to go to has gotten dull, it is all right.
Hey, I wonder if we are both the same?
I still feel love for you, but you are no longer looking at me.
Episode 12 Preview...
Yano...
I cannot make you happy.
I am sorry I cannot keep our promise...
Everyone was dreaming...
